apiKey.doc_description: The widget access api key associated with your DTN account.

container.doc_description: The container to mount the widget on. This can be a reference to an HTML element, or a valid selector string. If a string is encountered, document.querySelector will be used to search document for the container.

units.doc_description: The measuring units that are used for presenting numbers in the weather forecast.

units_type.doc_description: These are the available metric sistems that widget support.

locale.doc_description: The language to display the widget.
